faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Our promise: Clear answers. Global expertise. Tangible transformation.

items.question: How long does it take to see results?
items.answer: Our clients typically see initial results within 4-6 weeks of implementation start. Significant results appear within 3-6 months depending on project complexity.

items.question: How secure are your solutions?
items.answer: We adhere to the highest security standards (ISO 27001, GDPR). All data is encrypted and we sign strict confidentiality agreements with all our clients.

items.question: Do you work with small and mid-sized businesses?
items.answer: We work with companies of all sizes, from startups to multinationals. Our solutions are tailored to the specific needs and budgets of each client.

items.question: Do you offer training programs?
items.answer: Absolutely! Training is an integral part of our approach. We offer customized training so your teams can get the most out of the implemented AI solutions.
